snippet: Runners who decide not to compete in the Boston Marathon because of the unusually warm weather conditions forecast for Monday will be allowed to defer their entries.
abstract: Runners who decide not to compete in the Boston Marathon because of the unusually warm weather conditions will be allowed to defer their entries to the 2013 race.
lead_paragraph: Runners who decide not to compete in the Boston Marathon because of the unusually warm weather conditions forecast for Monday will be allowed to defer their entries.

headline.seo: Heat in Forecast Prompts Changes For Boston Marathon
headline.main: Heat in Forecast Prompts Changes for Boston Marathon
headline.print_headline: Heat in Forecast Prompts Changes in Boston Race
